article.title: SIX3 Receives Intelligence Support Contract
article.text: SIX3 Intelligence Solutions Inc., McLean, Virginia, was awarded a $25,094,968 firm-fixed-price contract with options for intelligence technical support for the U.S. Army Europe area of responsibility, with an estimated completion date of July 29, 2021. Bids were solicited via the Internet with seven received. Funding and work location will be determined with each order. The Army Contracting Command, 409th CSB, APO AE, is the contracting activity (W564KV-16-D-0002).
